item.description:
The Hide Away

@ Anthony's

105 Canal St

Malden, MA 02148

617 877 18085

COMEDY SHOW with none other MICHELE BALAN to be followed with DANCING

Doors OPEN at 7:00 pm.

SHOW STARTS at 8:00 pm.

****DJ & DANCING 9:00 pm to 1:30 am.

Michele Balan was one of the finalists on NBC's Last Comic Standing, and she was the Last Women Comic Standing!

You can catch her on various episodes of Comics Unleashed and The Joy Behar Show and was invited to perform on Jay Leno's Tonight show (3)THREE times.

Voted one of the Top 10 Comics by Backstage Magazine, Michele is a stand-up comedian with class and attitude. Sometimes the class has to move over for the attitude. “Laughter brings us together,” she says as she travels the world headlining comedy clubs, theaters, cruises, and corporate events. Michele recently toured with the Smothers Brothers celebrating their 50th anniversary in show biz!

Ticket price $20.00 in advance // $25.00 at the door.

PURCHASE TICKETS at www.BlushBoston.com

General seating, first come first serve.

Reservations for tables can be made .

***DANCING from 9:00 pm to 1:30 am ($7.00 door cover)***
item.name: Comedian Michele Balan and dancing
